full_summary:
### Waste Removal Services

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Waste Removal Services
**Reference Number:** cb-651-88869367
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 21301-24-4509894
**Publication Date:** 2023-09-26
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-06T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-11-06

### Tender Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide waste removal services for its Quebec Region facilities, including Laval and Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines complexes, as well as Cowansville, Drummond, Donnacona, Joliette, and Port-Cartier Institutions.

The contractor will be responsible for collecting and processing residual materials, including recyclable materials and organic waste (if applicable), in accordance with the scheduled services outlined in the technical specifications.

**Duration of Standing Offer:** December 1st, 2023 to November 30, 2025, with the option to renew for one additional one-year period.

**Trade Agreement:** This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Tendering Procedures:** All interested suppliers may submit a bid. Competitive bidding will be conducted using the lowest priced compliant bid selection criterion.

**Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Certification Requirements:** No certification requirements are specified in the solicitation documentation.

**Evaluation Criteria:** The lowest price compliant bid will be the determining factor in the evaluation of bids.

**Attachments:** The following attachments are available for download:

* Addendum-1
* RFSA
* Specifications

**Contact Information:**

* Kim Lavallée
* Phone: 514-235-9156
* Email: [kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:kim.lavallee@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers free seminars for businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* After contract award, bidders may request a debrief
